fieldDescription:
The [A Promise] quest, which kicks off one of SotF's core questlines, has a much smaller [2 percent] chance to begin at bars, rather than being almost guaranteed.

Recommended only for those who've played the questline before, and want to experience it whenever it decides to find them rather than on schedule.

Certain Nexerelin starts require that the player fulfils certain requirements first:

[Banshee's Lost Thread] requires 80 percent or higher in the [Dawn and Dust] mission
Chance that certain unique officers will have a brief conversation at the start of a battle.
Value added to (or if negative, subtracted from) the player's accumulated guilt value.
Starting guilt in the [The Haunted] Nexerelin custom start and background.
When total guilt reaches this level, an [adaptive nanite swarm] will begin invading the player's battles to punish them.
The base chance of being invaded in a given battle.
Increase in invasion chance per point of guilt beyond the invasion threshold.
Guilt threshold at which the player's perception of their hunter changes, becoming more unreliable and ethereal.
